panels.description: Based on the average node_total_hourly_cost in the last 30d
panels.title: Average Daily Cloud Costs

panels.description: Based on the average total hourly node cost from the last 30d
panels.title: Estimative Monthly Cloud Costs

panels.description: Based on total node price over 7d and 1d

targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)
Relative price now vs 1d ago (Hour Price)

panels.title: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price)

panels.description: Based on total node price over 7d and 1d

targets.legendFormat: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price)

panels.title: Standard Variation of Cost by InstanceType (7d/1d)

targets.expr:
topk(20,
  sum(
    sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) 
    by (namespace,instance)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)

    +

    sum(container_cpu_allocation) 
    by (namespace,instance)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
  ) by (namespace)
)

topk(20,
  sum(
    sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance, container)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
    +
    sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance, container)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
  ) by (namespace, container)
)

topk(20,
  sum(
    sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance, pod)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
    +
    sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance, pod)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
  ) by (pod)
)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,namespace, instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (container,namespace, instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace, container)

topk(20,
  sum(
    sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (instance, container)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_ram_hourly_cost / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
    +
    sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (instance, container)
    * on(instance) group_left() (
			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} * 720
			+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
			label_replace
			(
				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
			) * 0
		)
  ) by (container)
)
